org.mapsforge.core.model

Class CoordinatesUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mapsforge.core.model.CoordinatesUtil

  • public final class CoordinatesUtil
extends Object
    A utility class to convert, parse and validate geographical coordinates.

    • Method Detail

      • degreesToMicrodegrees

        public static int degreesToMicrodegrees(double coordinate)
        Converts a coordinate from degrees to microdegrees (degrees * 10^6). No validation is performed.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - the coordinate in degrees.
        Returns:
        the coordinate in microdegrees (degrees * 10^6).

      • microdegreesToDegrees

        public static double microdegreesToDegrees(int coordinate)
        Converts a coordinate from microdegrees (degrees * 10^6) to degrees. No validation is performed.
        Parameters:
        coordinate - the coordinate in microdegrees (degrees * 10^6).
        Returns:
        the coordinate in degrees.

      • parseCoordinateString

        public static double[] parseCoordinateString(String coordinatesString,
                                             int numberOfCoordinates)
        Parses a given number of comma-separated coordinate values from the supplied string.
        Parameters:
        coordinatesString - a comma-separated string of coordinate values.
        numberOfCoordinates - the expected number of coordinate values in the string.
        Returns:
        the coordinate values in the order they have been parsed from the string.

      • validateLatitude

        public static void validateLatitude(double latitude)
        Parameters:
        latitude - the latitude coordinate in degrees which should be validated.

      • validateLongitude

        public static void validateLongitude(double longitude)
        Parameters:
        longitude - the longitude coordinate in degrees which should be validated.
